spec_data.Name: perl-Paper-Specs
spec_data.Description:
This package provides features such as:
- Layout PDF and PostScript documents
- Obtain page size information
- Support page sizes you didn't know about
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 02:56:23 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Size and layout information for paper stock, forms, and labels
